readme:
# Insert Hello World
> Insert Hello World with just two keystrokes

[![apm](https://img.shields.io/apm/v/insert-hello-world.svg?style=flat-square)](https://atom.io/packages/insert-hello-world)
[![apm](https://img.shields.io/apm/dm/insert-hello-world.svg?style=flat-square)](https://atom.io/packages/insert-hello-world)
[![apm](https://img.shields.io/apm/l/insert-hello-world.svg?style=flat-square)](https://atom.io/packages/insert-hello-world)

## Installation

Go to `Settings > Install` and then search for `insert-hello-world` under `Packages`.

After installing this package, please restart Atom Editor.

## Snippets Usage

* `hw` will replace these two letters with `Hello World!`
  * supported for JavaScript, JSON, Markdown, HTML, PHP, Java and Python.
* `hlog` will insert `console.log` that contains pre-defined Hello World Statement in `*.js` file.
* `hecho` will insert echo that contains pre-defined Hello World Statement in `*.php` file.

---

### Contribute

Pull requests for more snippets are welcome. If you like to add support for a language you work in, feel free to contribute and open a pull request.

In lieu of a formal style guide, take care to maintain the existing coding style.
